query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS chat_history (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  conversationId VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
  role ENUM('user', 'assistant') NOT NULL,
  content LONGTEXT NOT NULL,
  topic VARCHAR(255),
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_userId (userId),
  INDEX idx_conversationId (conversationId)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2F5rqD8cJ63W6KH.ff46c3c87d90 --database FEHVCygW4T5Ut9fR7hCHgq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS chat_history (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  conversationId VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
  role ENUM('user', 'assistant') NOT NULL,
  content LONGTEXT NOT NULL,
  topic VARCHAR(255),
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_userId (userId),
  INDEX idx_conversationId (conversationId)
);
